import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useGlobalContext} from "../../context/context"; import balanceImg from '../../assets/balance.svg'; import stakeImg from '../../assets/stake.png'; const Stats = () => { const { gameData } = useGlobalContext(); const [serviceCompleted, setServiceCompleted] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { let newServiceCompleted = Math.floor(((Date.now() - gameData.player.serviceTimestamp) / gameData.player.timeForService) * 100); setServiceCompleted(newServiceCompleted); }, [gameData]); return ( <>

Service {gameData.player.typeOfService}

{gameData.player.amountOfAvailableService}

+1

{`${serviceCompleted}%`}

Upgrade

0) ? 'upgrade-container-green' : 'upgrade-container-red'}`}>

+

0) ? 'upgrade-container-green' : 'upgrade-container-red'}`}>

) }; export default Stats
